Join our hosts, Hector Navarro and Erika Ishii, every Friday afternoon as we re-wright comic book continuity. (As if they don't do that enough already) Who is the ultimate 90's cartoon? Who would win in a beat down; Avengers or Justice League? Find out as we battle to the figurative death with the HeroClix table top game. We have our favorite voice actors come out and play with us as we act out these famous battles. Watch live for a chance to win HeroClix figures!
